adrFormatAddress: 120 Bennett Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: Laurel and Charles did my brand deck and website copy for my practice. They captured and reflected  my “brand” back to me  in a way that exceeded my expectations - they definitely have a knack for this work.  What also really stands out is how much value I got from the process itself - they asked questions that got me reflecting on my business and career. And that reinvigorated my love for what I do and got me moving the practice in directions that feel right. I felt their dedication and investment from the very first day and I trusted that I was in good hands. Laurel and Charles are creative and talented - patient and kind -  quirky and a lot of fun to work with. I highly recommend them!! Thanks, guys!!

originalText.text:
Having a varied work history, I knew I would need to hire a particular type of resume writing professional who could weave some semblance of a cohesive story for me. I needed a distinctly human touch. Thankfully I was referred to Laurel and Charles of Pearl Consulting, a team I now call my resume therapists.

After identifying my goals, they hand crafted an approach to draw out and amplify my underrepresented skills. This complemented my foundational skills perfectly, making me a dynamic and empowered candidate in the competitive job market.

Laurel and Charles accommodated me when I fell ill in the middle of a collaborative phase of my project. Not only did they extend the utmost compassion and grace during my recovery, but they sprang into action when I came back to the table with a 24 hour deadline.

I highly recommend Pearl Consulting as writers, team members, and overall human beings. They are the advocates you need in your corner.

originalText.text: Pearl Consulting offered a fun and exciting way to extract information from the business owner, who often has zero time to put thoughts on paper, and wrote curated and lively blog articles for our organization.  If you are looking to breathe life into the marketing and thought leadership content of your company, I highly recommend working with Laurel and Charles.

originalText.text: I'm the owner of a boutique marketing/production company in NYC. Part of my job is to figure out the best way to express a company's brand. Doing that for my own company was a struggle. I contracted with Pearl Consulting to "Reveal My Brand." Through several discussions and many questions my brand became clear to me. Pearl Consulting nailed it. My "superpowers," and value props were revealed. I clearly learned how my company differentiates from my competitors. In addition, Laurel and Charles are terrific people. It was great working with them. I highly recommend them to help you to better understand your brand.

originalText.text:
Working with Pearl Consulting was an absolute pleasure.  Something I don't say lightly.  When I came to them I had a website but nothing else - and I needed a marketing plan to get me on the right track.

Laurel & Charles did a thorough evaluation of my website with clear suggestions on what needed to be done to make it better.  Their suggestions were precise and brilliant - things I totally missed!  They did a great job editing my copy and making layout and link adjustments on my site.

Over the next month we met weekly to get clear on my goals, my ideas target audience, what I was willing to do myself and what needed to be farmed out to other experts.

The final deliverable was a comprehensive, well thought out and well presented marketing plan that highlighted all the steps I need to take over the following year.  They also interviewed a host of social media experts on my behalf and recommended the ones they felt were best suited for my budget and business.

They totally hooked me up!  I would recommend them to anyone and am keeping them a part of my marketing team moving forward.  They have integrity, intelligence and their fees are reasonable and fair.  I could not ask for anything more.
